name: Abecean Longfin
acquiredBy: Collected by catching Abacean Longfin fish.

name: Ancestor Moth Wing
acquiredBy: Collected by catching Ancestor Moths.

name: Ash Creep Cluster
acquiredBy: Harvested from creep cluster plants unique to Solstheim.

name: Ash Hopper Jelly
acquiredBy: Collected from dead ash hoppers.

name: Ashen Grass Pod
acquiredBy: Harvested from spiky grass plants unique to Solstheim.

name: Bear Claws
acquiredBy: Collected from various types of dead Bears.

name: Bee
acquiredBy: Collected from beehives and by catching Bees.

name: Beehive Husk
acquiredBy: Collected from beehives.

name: Bleeding Crown
acquiredBy: Harvested from Bleeding Crown, a mushroom found in various caves.

name: Blisterwort
acquiredBy: Harvested from Blisterwort mushrooms found in various caves.

name: Blue Butterfly Wing
acquiredBy: Collected by catching Blue Butterflies. Often found during daylight hours near flowering plants.

name: Blue Dartwing
acquiredBy: Collected by catching Dragonflies found near rivers and streams below the snow line.

name: Blue Mountain Flower
acquiredBy: Harvested from the blue variety of Mountain Flower, found throughout Skyrim.

name: Boar Tusk
acquiredBy: Collected from dead bristlebacks and rieklings.

name: Bone Meal
acquiredBy: Collected from undead such as skeletons, and Draugr.

name: Briar Heart
acquiredBy: Collected from Forsworn Briarhearts.

name: Burnt Spriggan Wood
acquiredBy: Collected from dead burnt spriggans.

name: Butterfly Wing
acquiredBy: Collected from catching Monarch Butterflies. Often found during daylight hours near flowering plants.

name: Canis Root
acquiredBy: Harvested from Canis Root, found in The Rift and Hjaalmarch.

name: Charred Skeever Hide
acquiredBy: Food, collected from dead Skeevers found on roasting spits.

name: Chaurus Eggs
acquiredBy: Collected from Chaurus Egg Sacs, found in Falmer caves.

name: Chaurus Hunter Antennae
acquiredBy: Collected from dead Chaurus Hunters and Chaurus Hunter Fledglings.

name: Chicken's Egg
acquiredBy: Food, harvested from Chicken nests in various farms.

name: Creep Cluster
acquiredBy: Harvested from Creep Cluster, found in the volcanic tundra of Eastmarch.

name: Crimson Nirnroot
acquiredBy: Harvested from Crimson Nirnroot, found in Blackreach, needed for the quest A Return To Your Roots.

name: Cyrodilic Spadetail
acquiredBy: Collected by catching Cyrodilic Spadetail fish.

name: Daedra Heart
acquiredBy: Collected from dead Dremora.

name: Deathbell
acquiredBy: Harvested from Deathbell, found in Hjaalmarch. Needed for the quests Few and Far Between and The Only Cure.

name: Dragon's Tongue
acquiredBy: Harvested from Dragon's Tongue, found in the volcanic tundra of Eastmarch.

name: Dwarven Oil
acquiredBy: Collected from destroyed Dwarven Automatons, found in Dwarven Ruins.

name: Ectoplasm
acquiredBy: Collected from undead Ghosts.

name: Elves Ear
acquiredBy: Harvested from Dried Elves Ear bunches found in homes and camps.

name: Emperor Parasol Moss
acquiredBy: Harvested from emperor parasol moss plants near Tel Mithryn.

name: Eye of Sabre Cat
acquiredBy: Collected from dead Sabre Cats.

name: Falmer Ear
acquiredBy: Collected from dead Falmer.

name: Felsaad Tern Feathers
acquiredBy: Collected from dead Felsaad terns.

name: Fire Salts
acquiredBy: Collected from dead Flame Atronachs, a type of daedra. Needed for the quest Stoking the Flames.

name: Fly Amanita
acquiredBy: Harvested from Fly Amanita mushrooms, found in various caves.

name: Frost Mirriam
acquiredBy: Harvested from Dried Frost Mirriam bunches found in homes and camps.

name: Frost Salts
acquiredBy: Collected from dead Frost Atronachs, a type of daedra.

name: Garlic
acquiredBy: Food. Can also be harvested from Garlic Braids.

name: Giant Lichen
acquiredBy: Harvested from Giant Lichen, found in Hjaalmarch.

name: Giant's Toe
acquiredBy: Collected from dead Giants, which can be found in Giant Camps.

name: Gleamblossom
acquiredBy: Harvested from the plant of the same name.

name: Glow Dust
acquiredBy: Collected from dead Wisps and Wispmothers.

name: Glowing Mushroom
acquiredBy: Harvested from Glowing Mushrooms, found in various caves.

name: Grass Pod
acquiredBy: Harvested from Spiky Grass, found in northern regions of Skyrim.

name: Hagraven Claw
acquiredBy: Collected from dead Hagravens.

name: Hagraven Feathers
acquiredBy: Collected from dead Hagravens. Can also be found scattered around their sleeping areas.

name: Hanging Moss
acquiredBy: Harvested from Hanging Moss.

name: Hawk Beak
acquiredBy: Collected from dead Hawks.

name: Hawk Feathers
acquiredBy: Collected from dead Hawks.

name: Hawk's Egg
acquiredBy: Harvested from Hawk nests.

name: Histcarp
acquiredBy: Collected by catching Histcarp fish.

name: Honeycomb
acquiredBy: Food. Collected from beehives.

name: Human Flesh
acquiredBy: Cannot be harvested or collected; with the Dawnguard add-on installed, several respawning samples can be found in Volkihar Keep.

name: Human Heart
acquiredBy: Cannot be harvested or collected; limited number of samples available.

name: Ice Wraith Teeth
acquiredBy: Collected from Ice Wraiths. Needed for the quest Ice Cold.

name: Imp Stool
acquiredBy: Harvested from Imp Stool mushrooms, found in various caves.

name: Jazbay Grapes
acquiredBy: Harvested from Jazbay vines, found in the volcanic tundra of Eastmarch. Needed for the quest Smooth Jazbay.

name: Juniper Berries
acquiredBy: Harvested from Juniper shrubs, common in The Reach. Needed for the quest Elmus Favor Quest.

name: Large Antlers
acquiredBy: Collected from dead male Elk.

name: Lavender
acquiredBy: Harvested from Lavender, most common in Whiterun Hold.

name: Luna Moth Wing
acquiredBy: Collected by catching Luna Moths. Often found near flowers after dark.

name: Moon Sugar
acquiredBy: Cannot be collected or harvested. Can be purchased from the Khajiit Traders.

name: Mora Tapinella
acquiredBy: Harvested from Mora Tapinella mushrooms, found growing on dead trees.

name: Mudcrab Chitin
acquiredBy: Collected from dead Mudcrabs, found in or near bodies of water.

name: Namira's Rot
acquiredBy: Harvested from Namira's Rot mushrooms, found in various caves.

name: Netch Jelly
acquiredBy: Collected from dead netch.

name: Nightshade
acquiredBy: Harvested from Nightshade, found growing throughout Skyrim. Needed for the quest Few and Far Between.

name: Nirnroot
acquiredBy: Harvested from Nirnroot, found near bodies of water throughout Skyrim. Needed for the quest Few and Far Between.

name: Nordic Barnacle
acquiredBy: Harvested from Nordic Barnacle Clusters, found in or near water.

name: Orange Dartwing
acquiredBy: Collected by catching Dragonflies found near rivers and streams below the snow line.

name: Pearl
acquiredBy: Cannot be harvested or collected in the original version of the game; only readily available after the Merchant perk has been unlocked. With Dragonborn, they can be harvested from Pearl Oysters in Solstheim.

name: Pine Thrush Egg
acquiredBy: Harvested from bird nests in forested regions, in particular The Rift.

name: Poison Bloom
acquiredBy: Harvested from the plant of the same name.

name: Powdered Mammoth Tusk
acquiredBy: Cannot be harvested or collected; only readily available after the Merchant perk has been unlocked.

name: Purple Mountain Flower
acquiredBy: Harvested from the purple variety of Mountain Flower.

name: Red Mountain Flower
acquiredBy: Harvested from the red variety of Mountain Flower.

name: River Betty
acquiredBy: Collected by catching River Betty fish.

name: Rock Warbler Egg
acquiredBy: Harvested from bird nests in rocky regions, in particular The Reach.

name: Sabre Cat Tooth
acquiredBy: Collected from dead Sabre cats.

name: Salmon Roe
acquiredBy: Harvested from jumping Salmon.

name: Salt Pile
acquiredBy: Food. Cannot be harvested or collected, but is commonly found in barrels and sacks.

name: Scaly Pholiota
acquiredBy: Harvested from Scaly Pholiota mushrooms, found growing on dead trees.

name: Scathecraw
acquiredBy: Harvested from scathecraw plants.

name: Silverside Perch
acquiredBy: Collected by catching Silverside Perch fish.

name: Skeever Tail
acquiredBy: Collected from dead Skeevers.

name: Slaughterfish Egg
acquiredBy: Collected from Slaughterfish Egg Nests, found in or near water.

name: Slaughterfish Scales
acquiredBy: Collected from dead Slaughterfish.

name: Small Antlers
acquiredBy: Collected from dead female Elk.

name: Small Pearl
acquiredBy: Cannot be harvested or collected in the original version of the game; only readily available after the Merchant perk has been unlocked. With Dragonborn, they can be harvested from Pearl Oysters in Solstheim.

name: Snowberries
acquiredBy: Harvested from Snowberry bushes, found in snowy regions of Skyrim.

name: Spawn Ash
acquiredBy: Collected from dead ash spawn.

name: Spider Egg
acquiredBy: Collected from spider Egg Sacs and Web Sacs.

name: Spriggan Sap
acquiredBy: Cannot be harvested or collected; best source is merchants.

name: Swamp Fungal Pod
acquiredBy: Harvested from Swamp Fungal Pod, common in the tundra marsh of Hjaalmarch.

name: Taproot
acquiredBy: Collected from dead Spriggans.

name: Thistle Branch
acquiredBy: Harvested from Thistle.

name: Torchbug Thorax
acquiredBy: Collected by catching Torchbugs. Found below the snowline after dark.

name: Trama Root
acquiredBy: Harvested from trama root plants.

name: Troll Fat
acquiredBy: Collected from dead Trolls. Needed for the quest The Cursed Tribe.

name: Tundra Cotton
acquiredBy: Harvested from Tundra Cotton, found in Whiterun Hold.

name: Vampire Dust
acquiredBy: Collected from dead Vampires.

name: Void Salts
acquiredBy: Collected from dead Storm Atronachs.

name: Wheat
acquiredBy: Food. Harvested from wheat bushels, found in various farms.

name: White Cap
acquiredBy: Harvested from White Cap mushrooms, found in various caves.

name: Wisp Wrappings
acquiredBy: Collected from dead Wispmothers.

name: Yellow Mountain Flower
acquiredBy: Harvested from the yellow variety of Mountain Flower.

name: Alocasia Fruit
acquiredBy: Originating from the Shivering Isle. One of the Rare Curios sold by Khajiit trade caravans.

name: Ambrosia
acquiredBy: Originating from Mankar Camoran's destroyed realm of Oblivion. One of the Rare Curios sold by Khajiit trade caravans.

name: Angelfish

name: Angler Larvae
